prompt: <description>Part 1: Three-Dimensional Rectangular Prism Construct a three-dimensional rectangular prism. Begin by creating a new coordinate system. Set the Euler angles to [0.0, 0.0, -90.0] and the translation vector to [0.0, 0.1944, 0.0]. This will position the prism with its base at y = 0.1944 and its shorter sides facing the positive and negative x-axes. Create a sketch on the XY plane of this coordinate system. Draw a rectangle comprised of four lines: 1. Starting at (0.0, 0.0), ending at (0.75, 0.0) 2. Starting at (0.75, 0.0), ending at (0.75, 0.3472) 3. Starting at (0.75, 0.3472), ending at (0.0, 0.3472) 4. Starting at (0.0, 0.3472), ending at (0.0, 0.0) Use the "scale" command to adjust the sketch by a factor of 0.75. Transform the 2D sketch into 3D using an extrusion operations of depth 0.1944, in the positive Z direction. Part 2: Cylindrical Shaped Cut Create a cylindrical shape with a slightly tapered top and bottom, having a smooth surface and symmetrical along its central axis. Begin with a new coordinate system, using the same Euler angles as before ([0.0, 0.0, -90.0]), and the following translation vector: [0.3729, 0.0, 0.0743]. Draw a circle with a center at (0.0993, 0.0993) and radius of 0.0993 on the XY plane of the newly created coordinate system. Scale the sketch by 0.1986. Perform a cut extrusion using a depth of 0 (towards the normal) and 0.1944 (opposite the normal). This will create a centered cylindrical cut going a quarter of the way down the original rectangular prism. The resulting object will be a rectangular prism with a cylindrical hole in the center.</description>
completion:
<json>
{"parts":{"part_1":{"coordinate_system":{"Euler Angles":[0.0,0.0,-90.0],"Translation Vector":[0.0,0.1944,0.0]},"sketch":{"face_1":{"loop_1":{"line_1":{"Start Point":[0.0,0.0],"End Point":[0.75,0.0]},"line_2":{"Start Point":[0.75,0.0],"End Point":[0.75,0.3472]},"line_3":{"Start Point":[0.75,0.3472],"End Point":[0.0,0.3472]},"line_4":{"Start Point":[0.0,0.3472],"End Point":[0.0,0.0]}}}},"extrusion":{"extrude_depth_towards_normal":0.1944,"extrude_depth_opposite_normal":0.0,"sketch_scale":0.75,"operation":"NewBodyFeatureOperation"}},"part_2":{"coordinate_system":{"Euler Angles":[0.0,0.0,-90.0],"Translation Vector":[0.3729,0.0,0.0743]},"sketch":{"face_1":{"loop_1":{"circle_1":{"Center":[0.0993,0.0993],"Radius":0.0993}}}},"extrusion":{"extrude_depth_towards_normal":0.0,"extrude_depth_opposite_normal":0.1944,"sketch_scale":0.1986,"operation":"CutFeatureOperation"}}}}
</json>
